Pyrolytic cleaning
Easily keep your oven clean with the pyrolytic cleaning function. The door is safely locked and the oven heats up to 500°C to burn off any grease and fat, leaving behind a small pile of ash that can be simply wiped away. It costs just a few pence per cycle too, so it saves you money from buying expensive oven cleaners.
Electronic controls
Offering accurate time keeping and an easy to use minute minder for meals that need more precise timing, the electronic controls are an ideal tool to assist you when cooking.
Anti-fingerprint coating
The fingerprint resistant coating on the stainless steel finish keeps this electric oven looking as good as new.
Quadruple-glazing
Quadruple-glazing ensures the door is cool to the touch, keeping you safe from burns when curious hands touch the door.

For a fridge freezer with a huge amount of storage for the busy family home, consider the LG GSL961PZBV American-Style Fridge Freezer.CapacityWith a massive net capacity of 601 litres, you will have plenty of space to store your chilled and frozen goods with the GSL961PZBV.The fridge has four shelves, three door compartments and two vegetable crispers to provide you will a wealth of options for storing food and drink. It works to save energy and increase durability by using a unique direct transmission mechanism which minimises mechanical loss.Plus with the LG Appliance Smart Diagnosis app, you can analyse the appliance to identify any potential issues. item.title: HOTPOINT HUE61K S Electric Ceramic Cooker - Black (BB6015)
item.description:
Product features
Width: 60 cm Double-oven cooker with grill Fan oven Fully programmable Catalytic liners
The Hotpoint HUE-61KS Electric Ceramic Cooker lets you enjoy great home cooking and has an eye-catching contemporary black finish.
Have more on the hob
There are four cooking zones at your disposal on the smooth ceramic hob, allowing you to accommodate pots and pans of various sizes to create the dishes you want to.
Powerful, quick to heat up and easy to clean, ceramic hobs are a fantastic way to cook. The seamless hob also provides robust, level support for all your cookware, so you're guaranteed even heat and stable cooking.
A double ring highlight emphasizes where larger vessels can stand for any oversize pots and pans you might need to use.
Dual oven glory
The H-UE61K-S Electric Cooker offers two ovens so you can prepare different dishes simultaneously for a complete meal.
Roast birds and big joints of meat in the large 71-litre main cavity, which uses fanned technology for even, dynamic heat distribution. The 39-litre medium-sized second oven uses conventional heat so you can cook items at different levels for different effects.
Roast a tray of vegetables, prepare a pizza or bake a batch of scones in either cavity. The main cavity lends itself to batch baking, and there's a variable electric grill included in the second cavity for you to prepare meat, vegetables or cheese on toast in a healthier and deliciously browned way.
The programmable timer is a handy feature, allowing you to set your oven to the time you require, then forget about it until it's time to remove your items.
Easy oven upkeep
Featuring catalytic liners in both oven cavities, the Hotpoint HUE6-1KS Electric Ceramic Cooker makes oven maintenance a lot simpler.
The catalytic agents use the heat of the oven to break down grease and excess fats at high temperatures, so you'll have more time to cook and do the things you want to. Wipe away the residues quickly and effortlessly.
Safer and more practical cooking
The Hotpoint HU-E61-KS Cooker is fitted with triple-glazed glass in each door, so the heat is kept decisively in each cavity. This makes for a cool touch door that's much safer.
The inclusion of shelf stopper grids prevents accidents by keeping the oven shelves securely level and in place. An energy efficiency rating of A for each oven cavity indicates an appliance that saves you money and is kinder to the environment.
Take your cooking to the next level when you use the Hotpoint HUE-61KS Electric Ceramic Cooker with its stylish black finish to prepare a host of delicious meals.
Hotpoint and Jamie Oliver

item.title: HOTPOINT FFU3DX 450 Litre Freestanding Fridge Freezer 60/40 Split Frost Free 70cm Wide - Stainless Steel BB6054
item.description:
This Hotpoint Trio freestanding fridge freezer is perfect for larger households, easily storing up to 25 bags worth of shopping with its impressive 450L capacity. The 40/60 split design offers plenty of fridge and freezer storage, with some excellent features to optimise food storage quality. The stylish stainless steel 3 door design will fit right in with any décor and delivers the American fridge freezer style that takes up less space. Plus, whether you fill it with fish, meat, fruit or veggies, this Hotpoint fridge-freezer comes with Day 1 technology to create the right environment for your food, keeping it fresher for longer. SUPER FREEZE – With the press of a button set the freezer into super freeze mode, rapidly freezing new additions to the freezer. Excellent for when you've just don't a big shop, freezing quickly will lock in key nutrients, quality and flavour. Super freeze mode automatically switches off after 24 hours. FOOD CARE ZONE – A special fridge zone dedicated to the storage of delicate food which can also be used as a safe place to defrost food. The low temperature (-2/3°C) keeps food fresh for up to a week, preserving nutrients and flavours. MULTI-AIR FLOW – Evenly circulates cool air throughout the appliance, which keeps food fresher for longer and eliminates any cool spots, so all storage areas have the optimum temperature. VARIABLE TEMPERATURE ZONE – The top freezer drawer enables you to manually set the temperature between 0-26°C, giving you great freezing flexibility to suit different types of food. HOLIDAY MODE – Save energy whilst you're away. Holiday mode allows the freezer to function as normal however the empty fridge operates at 12°C to save energy. ENERGY EFFICIENT – Saving money on your energy bills whilst being kinder to the environment, rated A+ for energy efficiency. This spacious fridge freezer will cost as little as 18p per day to run! • Energy efficiency rating: A+• Annual energy consumption: 417.0 KW• Annual energy cost: £66• Power failure safe storage time: 20 hrs Spacious and efficient in performance, the Hotpoint Day 1 FFU3DX Fridge Freezer is built to cope with the ever-changing demands of the modern family. Combining the convenience of a fridge and a freezer in one unit, the FFU3DX offers a large storage volume of 450 litres including a Food Care Zone which is the coolest place in your fridge, ideal for preserving your meat and fish. Precision Temperature Control ensures cool air is distributed throughout the fridge cavity to create a constant temperature, keeping your food perfectly fresh for longer. Frost Free technology stops the build-up of ice, so you'll never need to defrost your appliance again. It works by keeping the perfect humidity level in your freezer and circulating fresh air around the compartment. Precision Temperature Control - Cool air is distributed throughout the fridge cavity to create a constant temperature, keeping your food perfectly fresh for longer with Precision temperature control Food Care Zone - The Food Care zone is the coolest place in your fridge, ideal for preserving your meat and fish Frost Free - Frost Free fridge freezers stop the build-up of ice, so you'll never need to defrost your appliance again. It works by keeping the perfect humidity level in your freezer and circulating fresh air around the compartment.   FEATURES:
Total Capacity: 450 Litres which is the same as 23 bags of shopping A+ energy rating Split type: 60 / 40 Split Precision Temperature Control Multi air flow technology - Circulates cool air, keeping food fresher for longer Food Care Zone, reduced temperature keeps food fresh & also offers defrosting Frost Free freezer which means there is no manual defrosting required Super Freeze mode - freezes new items fast to lock in the flavours No frost fridge cooling system, no icy build ups 4 Star feezer

item.g:id: Bosch Serie 4 Freestanding Dishwasher - White SMS46MW03G
item.title: Bosch Serie 4 Freestanding Dishwasher - White SMS46MW03G
item.description: Now your dishwasher features high-level flexibilitySometimes you can't fit everything you want into your dishwasher because of its inflexible setup. The VarioDrawer is an extra level at the top of Activewater dishwashers, which solves this problem. It is the ideal place for cutlery and smaller kitchen utensils like ladles or whisks and can even fit espresso cups. This gives you more flexibility when loading your dishwasher and leaves more space in the bottom basket. The cutlery basket can also be replaced by the VarioDrawer to create capacity for up to 14 place settings in 60cm dishwashers and 10 place settings in 45cm dishwashers. As a result, your dishwasher will allow for more flexible and comfortable loading. VarioFlex ProThe innovativeVarioFlex Pro basket system offers a wide range of adjustment options. Thanks to the red touchpoints and Rackmatic lever, you can always see immediately where and how you can adjust the baskets flexibly to the dishes to be loaded. This means more dishes can become dazzlingly clean – in just one wash. Automatic programmesEnsure the optimum cleaning performance automatically. Water usage, the water temperature and the rinsing time are adjusted exactly to how dirty the load is, providing the best results while saving water and energy. Rinses three times faster with optimum cleaning and drying results with VarioSpeed PlusUse the VarioSpeed Plus option to wash and dry a full load of dishes perfectly clean in the shortest of time. Rinse time is reduced at the push of a button by up to 66% with the usual high cleaning efficiency. Simply activate the VarioSpeed Plus option when you need dishes fast, e.g. at family celebrations or birthday parties. Heat Exchanger: always the right temperature for optimal dish careDishwashers with heat exchangers treat precious glasses and porcelain with particular care and no risks. Water is pre-heated in the rinsing tank to avoid any temperature shocks. Perfect cleaning results without wasting a drop of waterAquaSensor: Stain detection for brilliantly clean dishes.The AquaSensor regulates the water usage depending on the type and degree of soiling, using light beams to manage the rinse. Depending on remaining food particles, grease or detergent residues in the rinse, the rinsing process is assessed to determine whether it needs to be continued. HygienePlusFor total piece of mind, select HygienePlus. A hotter final rinse is held for longer with temperatures of up to 70°C for higher anti-bacterial performance. Hygiene plus is therefore ideal for anyone who requires the highest hygiene standards, for example allergy sufferers or families with small children.**please note that although the HygienePlus program is perfect for cleaning chopping boards, children's plates, cups and bottles etc., it is not suitable for sterilising baby bottles. Child lock on door prevents unintended door opening during rinsingA child-proof door lock prevents the door from being opened and the programme being altered during the cycle. This prevents injuries caused by hot steam and accidental adjustments to the programme settings. Glass protectionGlass protection for gentle care for your glasses and delicate dishes. Because soft water causes glass corrosion, Bosch dishwashers with glass protection regulate the degree of hardness. This is how we optimize the protection of valuable glasses and delicate china with special care. Easy pre-select programme start for the desired start timeWith the time delay function you can pre-select the programme for the desired start time. This allows you to handle your appliance conveniently, at any time during the day, during work hours or at night. After the start of the programme a display indicates the precise remaining time. LoadSensorThe LoadSensor function helps you save water and energy when washing fewer dishes.Smaller loads require less water. Sensors detect this and adjust the water level

item.title: Hotpoint NSWM 742U GG UK N Freestanding Washing Machine, 7kg Load, 1400rpm Spin, White - BB6059
item.description:
Product Information
Keeping on top of household chores just got that little bit easier. This washing machine from Hotpoint keeps your clothes looking and feeling at their best, thanks to its range of features that'll care for even the most delicate and sensitive laundry loads. Freestanding DesignThis freestanding washing machine sits on its own, stacked or under the counter. You can place it anywhere where there's a connection, which means they're great if you move house as you can just disconnect and go. 1400rpm Spin SpeedSpin speed refers to how quickly the washing machine's drum can rotate in order to remove excess water out of clothes. The 1400rpm on this machine makes it ideal for doing everyday laundry, drying tees and shirts just enough so that clothes don't come out dripping wet whilst still ensuring not to damage the fabric. Automatic Load AdjustmentCleverly weighing each load automatically to provide a tailored cycle, the sensors in this washing machine adjust programme times precisely, ensuring optimum treatment for every garment. Your laundry comes out with that fresh, new feeling every time, plus you save water and energy.
Steam Hygiene CycleThe Steam Hygiene cycle provides the ultimate care and protection for a totally hygienic wash. By introducing steam directly into the drum at the end of the cycle, it removes up to 99.9% of the most common bacteria without the use of chemical additives. Anti-Allergy CycleHotpoint laundry appliances feature Allergy UK's Seal of Approval as it removes 99.9% of major allergens, including dust mites and pollen, thanks to a high-temperature technology and extra rinses.
Digital DisplayProgramme your next wash in no time with the easy-to-use navigational features and light-up digital display that counts down to let you know exactly how much time your chosen cycle has left, so you can effectively plan other tasks in between. Quick Wash Cleans clothes in Under 30 MinutesIt's Sunday night and you've just realised you forgot to wash the little one's school uniform. No worries: the quick wash option has you covered. Cleaning clothes in under 30 minutes, the high-speed spin shortens drying times to ensure you'll never be short on a shirt or skirt. Delicates ProgrammeThe pain of hand washing your favourite blouse is over. Ideal for lingerie, lace or silk, why not take advantage of the delicate programme to keep your more treasured clothes looking at their best. It's low temperature and minimal drum rotation keeps garments from being damaged, and prevents stretching and ripping of fabric. Wool Friendly WashingWash your woollen items without fear of shrinkage or felting with the tailored wool programme. Thanks to a clever cool down at the end of the wash phase preventing chill-shock when the cold rinse begins, there's no harmful movements that might agitate and damage the fibres. Timer Delay FunctionWant to keep your laundry smelling at its freshest? Use the time delay option to ensure you're not leaving your favourite tees and jeans damp in the washing machine for hours on end. It'll liberate your schedule and also let you take advantage of off-peak electricity rates.

item.title: Zanussi ZOF35802XK Built Under Electric Double Oven - Stainless Steel
item.description:
Key Features
Main oven gives you lots of different ways to cook Second electric oven with handy grill setting Set the oven to turn off when your food is ready Liners on the back & roof of the oven absorb grease Dimensions (cm) H71.5 x W59.4 x D54.8
Product Overview
Cook delicious meals with this built-under Zanussi double oven. The main multifunctional oven has lots of cooking options to choose from, giving perfect results every time – whether you’re cooking a lasagne or baking a cake. Heat rises inside the second electric conventional oven, making it ideal for traditional roast dinners, and the grill setting prepares irresistible crispy bacon. You can set the electronic programmable timer to turn the oven off when your food’s ready too, so you’ll never over-cook anything, and catalytic liners absorb grease inside, so it’ll just need quickly wiping clean when you’re done. This oven has also been designed to fit under a worktop.

 TwinTech technologyThe AEG SCE8181VNS Integrated 50/50 Fridge Freezer uses TwinTech technology, with two cooling systems to keep your food fresher for longer. item.g:id: AEG SCE819E7TS Integrated 70/30 Frost Free Fridge Freezer-1
item.title: AEG SCE819E7TS Integrated 70/30 Frost Free Fridge Freezer with Sliding Door Fixing Kit - White KRR05
item.description:
Key Features
267 litre capacity - holds 14 bags of food shopping Separate cooling systems for the fridge and freezer Flexible storage - make the most of the space inside Spinning shelf lets you reach all of your food Dimensions (cm) - H188.4 x W54 x D54.9
Product Overview
If you’re looking for the perfect family fridge freezer, you’ll love this frost free model from AEG. Because it has a 267 litre capacity, it can easily hold up to 14 bags of delicious food. It comes with TwinTech™ NoFrost technology too, which uses separate cooling systems in both cabinets to regulate the temperature and humidity levels – keeping your ingredients fresher for longer. You can even customise the inside of the fridge by rearranging the shelves and compartments, giving you complete flexibility to store a 2-tier cake or tall bottle of pop. And thanks to the snazzy 360 degree spinning shelf, you’ll never have to stand on your tip toes to reach that jar of mayo again.

item.description:
Turn up to the office looking ready for business with the help of this Neff washing machine. Its 8kg drum capacity makes it perfect for medium-sized households, and because it comes with a speedy quick wash, you’ll enjoy clean shirts and skirts in as little as 15 minutes. The reload option also lets you add items into the drum once the cycle has already started, so it’s ideal if you’ve dropped a tie or two coming down the stairs. Keep your frozen meat and vegetables in the best conditions with this white under counter freezer from Hisense. It has an 82 litre capacity so you can fill it with 4 bags of your favourite groceries. item.title: AEG IAE84851FB 80cm Induction Hob With SenseFry
item.description:
Delivery: Within 5 working days Depth: 520 mm Height: 44 mm Width: 780 mm Weight: 12.94 kg Fuel Type: Electric Hob Type: Induction Hob Rings: 4 Colour: Black Years Guaranteed: 2 Manufacturer Model No: IAE84851FB Brand Name: AEG
PRODUCT DETAILS Get the very best taste and texture when frying with the 7000 SenseFry® Induction Hob. Just select the food and desired result. No more guessing when the pan or oil is at the right temperature. No more heat adjustments.  
CONSISTENT FRYING RESULTS WITH THE FRY SENSOR
The advanced Fry Sensor in the induction hob provides consistent frying for each dish. The sensor will sense, control and regulate an even temperature across the surface of the hob and the pan. So everything is fried to perfection.   FULL COLOUR TOUCH CONTROLS SPEAK YOUR LANGUAGE
The Full Colour Touch Controls user interface provides step by step guidance and live feedback, meaning you can cook with more confidence. It even teaches you how to sous vide. Take your cooking to the next level.   VERSATILE COOKING WITH FLEXIBRIDGE®
The FlexiBridge® feature allows you to customize your own cooking area, combining and controlling up to 4 segments in different ways. It's ideal for large or long pans, or when you need to cook many dishes at the same time.   HOB2HOOD®: THE HANDS-FREE HOOD
The Hob2Hood® function connects the hob and the hood. The cooker hood automatically adjusts the fan speed based on the heat, without lifting a finger. For powerful extraction when searing. And quieter extraction when simmering. EACH COOKING ZONE. INDIVIDUALLY TIMED
Once a cooking zone is in use, its timer can be accessed quickly and conveniently via the touchscreen display. No toggling through menus or other zones. And because each dish can be precisely timed, absolute control over the cooking process is assured.

This machine also comes with the option to delay the cycle start time for up to 24 hours. item.description:
10kg drum capacity - great for large households Steam setting kills bacteria and reduces creasing Special sensors adjust cycle to suit your load Super quiet model - great for open plan living Dimensions (cm) - H85 x W60 x D61
Stay on top of the daunting laundry pile with the help of this black Hisense washing machine. Its 10kg capacity makes it perfect for large households, and because it also comes with Auto Wash, clever sensors inside the drum will weigh your clothes. Once it’s done this, it’ll automatically adjust the water usage and temperature to give you the most efficient cycle possible. Plus, if you’ve just got home from a long woodland walk with the dog, the steam setting releases vapour into the drum to kill bacteria and reduce creases – perfect for those muddy towels and sweaty lycras. And thanks to the inverter motor, which uses brushless magnets instead of various moving parts, it’s a lot quieter to run and much longer lasting.

item.title: Hoover H-Fridge 500 HMNB 6182 X5WDKN FROST FREE
item.description:
DimensionsH186 x W60 x D64cm 306L Storage Capacity195L fridge, 111L freezer Water DispenserNo plumbing required
  This Hoover H-Fridge 500 HMNB 6182 X5WDKN 50/50 fridge freezer comes in a stainless steel finish. It has a total no frost cooling system, meaning you will never have to defrost the freezer and there are multiple air vents in the fridge to keep an even temperature on every shelf level and to ensure the temperature cools down quickly after the door has been opened. If you leave the door open for too long, an alarm will sound to warn you. The non-plumbed water dispenser will allow you to dispense water straight from the fridge door. This is fed from a water tank inside the fridge, which you manually fill, the tank is slimline and fits nicely under a door rack, so doesn’t take up too much space inside. In the fridge, bright LED lighting will help you to easily find your food and there are three shelves, two door racks and a drawer where you can store all your food and drink. The wine rack is handy for storing tall bottles. The 50/50 split on this fridge freezer means it has lots of freezer storage space. If you require something with more fridge space, then best to opt for a fridge freezer with either a 60/40 or 70/30 split. The doors are reversible which will give you the flexibility to place it anywhere in your kitchen. Hoover offer a 10 year guarantee on parts (1 year for labour), but to get this you have to remember to register your guarantee and parts are only free if they are fitted by a Hoover engineer.

item.description:
248 litre capacity - holds 13 bags of food shopping Auto defrost - no need to manually defrost the fridge Special drawer to keep fruit and veg organised Water dispenser - no plumbing required Dimensions (cm) - H173 x W55 x D58
Hosting game night? Stock up on snacks with this Candy fridge freezer. It’s got room for 7 bags of fresh food and 6 bags of frozen groceries, so you can get everyone’s favourites. Keep cool with refreshing drinks from the non-plumbed water dispenser – just fill up the tank inside for a chilled glass. Looking for the strawberries? You’ll find them in the salad crisper drawer, safe and sound from being smushed by other treats. And you’ll only have to scrape ice away once in a while to make sure it works at its best.

248 litre capacity - holds 13 bags of food shopping Manual defrost needed Special drawer to keep fruit and veg organised reversible doors to suit your kitchen layout Dimensions (cm) - H173 x W55 x D58
Need simple food storage you can trust? Then look no further than this Candy fridge freezer. With room for 7 bags of chilled goodies and 6 bags of frozen groceries, you can treat yourself to a pizza night whenever the mood strikes. Pepperoni or margherita? Why pick, get both. Whip up a side to go with it by having a looksee in the salad crisper drawer – it’ll keep your veg fresh. The doors can open from the left or right side too, so just swap the hinges and choose what’s best for your kitchen. You’ll also only have to defrost it by hand once in a while.

item.title: Hoover H-WASH 300 H3DS4965TACBE Wifi Connected 9Kg / 6Kg Washer Dryer with 1400 rpm - Black
item.description:
9kg wash, 6kg dry - great for medium-sized households Sensors work out the perfect drying time Adjust the intensity of the wash to remove stains Wash whites and colours together to save time Dimensions (cm) - H85 x W60 x D56
Make tiring chores a thing of the past with this black washer dryer from Hoover. Because it has a 9kg wash and a 6kg dry capacity, it’s perfect for medium-sized households. The Sensor Drying technology works out how much moisture your clothes have, stopping the cycle when they’re ready. This makes sure they don’t over-dry and it saves energy, too. And with the Stain Level Option, the machine adjusts to each load, so that food smudges aren’t a worry. Plus, the All in One programme lets you mix whites and colours at the same time, which means you don’t have to separate your outfits.

item.title: Hoover H3DS 4965TACE-80 9KG Washer Dryer - White
item.description: This Hoover washer dryer from the H-Wash 300 range comes with a 9kg wash load capacity, a 6kg dry capacity and a 1400 spin speed. There are 15 wash cycles to choose from, with 4 cycles below 60 minutes, including a 14-minute rapid wash, and the All In One full load in 59 minutes. Variable spin and temperature settings allow you to adjust the spin speed and temperature on all cycles to suit the load, and the steam function relaxes the folds and creases, making ironing easier. Fitted with WiFi technology, you can connect your smartphone to the machine, giving you the ability to download additional programmes and run diagnostic checks on your machine. KG mode weighs the load during the first 4 minutes and adjusts the length of the programme and the water consumption accordingly. And with 3 Rapid Wash Cycles under 60 minutes (44, 30 and 14) your clothes can be thoroughly cleaned in the quickest time possible. This machine also comes with a start delay for up to 24 hours. The clever Sensor Dry function allows you to choose the level of dryness you require from three options, and the machine will automatically switch off when it senses that this level has been reached, saving you time and energy. You can also use the Timed Drying function, which will let you set the cycle for a specific amount of time.
